Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, with one monolith whose character is pratically without flaws. No shades, that make fantasy even tastier.
